summary: This Mod Teach You All The Shouts In Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][size=4]This Mod Teach You All The Shouts In SKYRIM Including DLCS IT Also Adds 87 DragonSoul So You Can Learn Them ALL [/size]
[u][center][size=5]How To USE[/size][/center][/u][/i][/b][list]
[*][size=5][b][i]Just Extract The files to (skyrim/Data) or whatever your game folder name[/i][/b][/size]
[size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/list][b][i][size=5]is just extract it in the Data folder Then open Your Game And Then Open The Console Using The Button (`) In QWERTY Keyboard or (2) Using AZERTY Keyboard (Not Sure About The AZERTY) Then Type (Bat Kareemshouts) Then Press (Enter Key) Then You Will Have All Shouts Added[/size]
[u][center][size=5]Important[/size][/center][/u][size=5]Finish The quest line Before Using It to prevent problems with the quests
[/size][center][size=6][u]Notes
[/u]
[/size][b][i][size=5]No need To install The dlcs It Won't Be problem [/size][/i][/b][size=6]
[/size]

[/center]


[center][size=6]ENJOY[/size][size=5] [/size][/center][size=5]
[/size][/i][/b][b][i] [/i][/b][b][i]
[/i][/b][size=5][b][i][list]
[/list]
[/i][/b][/size]
author: AssassinKareem
